fulltext:
VY LE QUANG  
National: Viet Nam | Gender: Male | Age: 33 | Marital Status: Married 
Address: District 1, HCMC | M: 0902 584 562 | E: quangvy@gmail.com | Skype: quangvy18 
Summary 
Self-directed, detail-oriented engineer with 11 years of experience in analyze, design, develop and implement 
services, web and desktop-based applications. Have strong expertise in technical background, system design 
as well as in test, debug and optimize performance related application code.  
Capable of learning new programming languages, framework, technologies and complete projects within specified 
deadlines. Possess excellent in communication, problem-solving, documentation, analytical, mentor new member, 
explain technical problems to non-technical user and vice versa. 
Love working in English-speaking environment and have experienced in working directly with foreign colleagues, 
foreign customers and working abroad such as Dubai, Malaysia. 
Expertise 
e-commerce Site Development 
CMS Development 
Database Design 
Project Management 
Web API Development 
CI / CD 
Microservices 
Technical Management 
System Architecture 
Software Architecture  
Work Experience 
8/2017 – 5/2019 (21 months) 
USA (work remote from home) 
Technical Leader - deSABRAN LLC http://www.desabran.com/ 
Property Management System 
Project description: Platform for property owner to manage their rental 
Duration:  8 / 2017 – 2 / 2019 (18 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Design System Architect, Software Architect, decide platform, frameworks & tools use for implementation  
Recruit, manage & mentor dev teams. 
Manage development team of 4 developers. 
Implemented CI & CD use Gitlab Devops to deploy Docker containers.  
Technical:  
SQL Server, .Net core, Linux, Docker, Gitlab Devops. 
NCM Secure Messaging mobile app 
Project description: Provide secure messaging app for existing product at https://neocertified.com/ 
Duration:  12 / 2017 – 5 / 2019 (17 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Full SDLC from provide technical solution, project estimation to implement, testing and deployment.  
Cross-platform mobile application. 
Technical:  
SQL Server, Xamarin Form.  
7/2016 – 7/2017 (1 year) 
District 1, HCMC 
Senior .NET Developer - ProServe IT Corporation http://www.proserveit.com/ 
21st Century Travel Insurance Limited Distribution System 
Project description: Implement new travel insurance product for individual and group across Canada and USA.  
Duration: 8 / 2016 – 6 / 2017 (10 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Implement new features based on current system structure. 
Develop brand new product use Web API 2.0 connect with Angular JS client. 
Single sign on between old and new system. 
Technical:  
SQL Server, .Net, Asp.NET, Crystal Report. 
7/2015 – 7/2016 (1 year) 
District 1, HCMC 
Team Leader - CSC Viet Nam http://www.csc.com/ 
Achievements: Implement accessibility for one of these biggest .NET sites in the world.  
Accessibility for Emirates Airline website 
Project description: Enhancing Emirates Airline ‘s website at http://emirates.com to implement accessibility features. 
Duration: 7 / 2015 – 7 / 2016 (12 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Onsite at Dubai for 3 months to receive knowledge transfer & support client. 
Upgrade web component to conform to web accessibility based on 508 standards. 
Manage team of 4 developers & provide technical solutions. 
Manage development, staging servers, implemented CI & CD.  
Technical:  
SQL Server, .Net, WAVE, AMP, NVDA, Nodejs, Gulp, JIRA, Agile / Scrum, Jenkins. 
12/2013 – 10/2015 (2 years) 
USA (work remote from home) 
Senior .NET Developer - CyberWolf Inc. http://www.cyberwolf.com/ 
Achievements: Coordinated, created and maintained over 50 e-commerce sites. Cost estimates, quote preparation, core 
features implement and maintenance.   
Beacon Press eCommerce site 
Project description: Ecommerce site for Beacon Press at http://www.beacon.org/ 
Duration: 3 / 2014 – 5 / 2014 (2 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Migrate their web store to Power Web. 
Data synchronization from their ERP software to Able Commerce ‘s database.  
Invoices import from Power Web to client ‘s ERP. 
Technical:  
SQL Server, .Net, Able Commerce, ColdFusion, Asp.Net, jQuery, Waterfall 
Similar Projects: 
Orca Book Publishers http://orcabook.com/ 
The Ohio State University Publishing http://estore.osu-extension.org/  
Stackpole book http://www.stackpolebooks.com/ 
Brookes Publishing http://www.brookespublishing.com/  
12/2009 – 12/2013 (4 years) 
District 1, HCMC 
.NET Manager - International SOS Vietnam https://www.internationalsos.com/ 
Achievements: Implement corporate system to automation process and reduce paperwork. Created various systems from 
Appointment to CMS, CRM, Inventory, Billing …     
VCS application 
Project description: Manage patients, issue invoices and manage pharmacy inventory.  
Duration: 6 / 2010 – 12 / 2012 (30 months) 
Responsibilities:  
Link with appointment web application for appointment booking, update status.  
Multi-location data replication for reporting center.  
Automation deploy & upgrade system version. 
Technical:  
SQL Server, .Net, Asp.Net, Code smith, Microsoft Report, SVN. 
10/2008 – 12/2009 (1 year) 
District Tan Binh, HCMC 
Developer FEOS Company http://www.feosco.com/  
Education 
Software Engineering (Level: Good)  
Sai Gon University, District 5 - HCMC.  
Ranked 3/50 
2012 
Information Technology (Level: Good)  
Cao Thang College, District 1- HCMC 
Ranked 5/ 100 
2008 
Certificate  
Power searching with Google. 
2012 
Second prize of unprofessional University in the 16th 
Vietnam Student Olympiad in IT and the ACM/ICPC 2007 
Asia Regional Contest. 
2007 
Second prize of College Contest in the 15th Vietnam 
Student Olympiad in IT. 
2007 
First prize of College Team Contest in the 15th Vietnam 
Student Olympiad in IT. 
2006 
First prize of College in University of Science Contest. 
2006 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
